name: Micro Metroidvania
description:
Play as a single blue pixel that is destined to conquer the evil red pixels and save the world ! Featuring a 1x1 tileset and a huge world to explore with numerous different types of enemies to fight, abilities to find to unlock new areas, and smooth controls.  Once you defeat the final boss and win the game, you are given a grade based on your completion of the game and how many coins you collected. Can you get the legendary S-tier?

This game is also great for speedrunning, offering a speedrun clock that shows you your time after defeating the final boss. 

Controls: Keyboard and Controller Support !

Move with arrow keys, A and D, or left joystick.

Jump with up arrow key, W, Spacebar, or south button (B for Nintendo Switch). 

Attack with either shift or west button (Y for Nintendo Switch).

Look down with down key, S, or left joystick down. 

This was created in 1.5 weeks for a game jam with the theme “Less is More”.
